ygData.subject: Field of Bone
ygData.msgSnippet: I have yet another bard project going *sigh* I know I know, I could possibly be addicted to the class. At any rate, I went to the Field of Bone at 8, bringing
ygData.messageBody:
I have yet another bard project going *sigh* I know I know, I could possibly
be addicted to the class. At any rate, I went to the Field of Bone at 8,
bringing only my level 9 song, surely I would die before 10 and could grab
Anthem from my bankbox in Firiona Vie then. Well, I did have to make a trip
back to Kelethin to train dodge, but I am now level 11 and have yet to die.
Field of bone is great, highly recommended for 9-12. Hunt the area between
the Swamp zone and the pit for 8 and 9, the pit itself for 10-11.
I have also been taking the oportunity to sing some Iksar folks songs in
/shout, to mixed reviews, they are not a very musical race (they attribute
this to having no ears). Here are a few I have found so far:

It's what makes you not a mammal
That makes you dear to me
Your color patches are my favorite fun
When your flashing red and yellow
For all the world to see
My heart starts beating like I'm layin
on a hot rock in the sun.


Another:

Your lips are soft,so soft my love,
it's almost as if you are molting
My battle scars, and slight fungus collection
must surely leave you shy unto bolting
But you caught my eye e'en before you grew limbs
and I set out to win you or die
And I built you this nest, and just look at these grubs!
Oh please wag your tail or I'll cry



Tszaaz







[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
